data.name: All in your head
data.detailed_description:
You take on the role of a left-behind young man who has to spend the night in a cabin that was meant to be a destination party with his co-workers & friends. The cabin is located in a beautiful & secluded hill of the country-side. But seclusion can also mean lack of access to resources & unchartered territories.

In this first-person horror adventure, you walk through the cabin and surrounding areas, trying to uncover the mystery of what went wrong and why you are alone in the cabin now. However, you need to be careful. As uncovering the mystery also uncovers the horrors lying underneath the surface.



Use your phone as your flashlight, explore the area and uncover the mystery of what happened.. But make sure you have the tools to survive the night!

data.short_description: You are left behind to spend the night in a cabin that was meant to be a destination launch party. The cabin is located in a beautiful & secluded hill of the country-side. But seclusion can also mean unchartered territories and paranormal activity.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 / AMD Ryzen™ 3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 950 or AMD Radeon™ R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 / AMD Ryzen™ 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 (4 Cores) @ 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI® Radeon™ M295X @ 2GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes horror themed content with loud noises, psychological fear and fights without blood.
